txt.en: Molkha believes clearing the drake nest in the Pit of Stonejaws would be the best course of action.

'The Scout-master is right. We should clear out as many drakes in the Pit of Stonejaws as we can before we assault Shakhaj√¢t. If we do not, we risk facing two enemy forces at once, and no one wants that!\n\n'Well? Go on, then!'
Worms and drakes in the Pit of Stonejaws present a dangerous threat to the dwarves.
'Those drakes will no longer be a problem? Hmmm.\n\n'Perhaps I was wrong about you, [placeholder]. You do seem able to hold your own in combat!'
Defeat drakes and worms in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Molkha is scouting outside the drake-nest of Borkordh in the south-east corner of the Pit of Stonejaws.
Defeat drakes and worms in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
